text: Until the time at which your subscription is terminated, PixelMixer will retain all videos, data and other information in its secure systems, make that information only available to authorized users, and use that information only for the purposes of providing services and support.
We log all access to all accounts by IP address, so we can always verify that no unauthorized access has happened for as long as the logs are kept.
We'll only ever access your account to help you with a problem or squash a software bug.
When you write PixelMixer with a question or to ask for help, we'll keep that correspondence, and the email address, for future reference.

data_type: data transmit to pixelmixer on behalf
text: Data which is transmitted to PixelMixer on your behalf by 3rd party integrations is only used by PixelMixer as part of delivering your user experience.
When you write PixelMixer with a question or to ask for help, we'll keep that correspondence, and the email address, for future reference.
We also store any information you volunteer, like surveys, for as long as it makes sense.

Until the time at which your subscription is terminated, PixelMixer will retain all videos, data and other information in its secure systems, make that information only available to authorized users, and use that information only for the purposes of providing services and support.
